txt.en: 'As an herbalist and a healer, I often have need of many different ingredients. But I am also an Elf, which means I am not like to be caught unprepared! I have nearly everything I need, save this: holly berries.\n\n'They have many different medicinal purposes, and are used in a number of valuable remedies. If you can bring me holly berries from the area, I would be most pleased. You will find them on huorns and on wood-trolls throughout Western Eregion, I believe.'
Lornel needs holly berries for several of his medicinal remedies.
'I would be very pleased if you could bring me holly berries from huorns and wood-trolls throughout Western Eregion.'
Collect holly berries from huorns or wood-trolls in Western Eregion ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lornel is by the camp-fire at Idhobel.

'Thank you for these holly berries. I will add them to my ingredient pouch, and will make use of them in the days ahead.\n\n'I hope it was not too much trouble. Huorns and wood-trolls are both very dangerous if you are not prepared for their attacks, which can be most deadly for the unwary.'
Holly berries can sometimes be found on the huorns and wood-trolls that stalk Western Eregion.
Bring the holly berries to Lornel at Idhobel
